Hi, I'm Scott Chamberlain

I study the evolution of species interactions, how species interactions
influence evolution of species traits and influence communities, among other things.


If you want to learn more about my research research »
Or find out more aobut me about me »
Read my publications pubs »
My talks talks »

I co-founded a devloper collective called rOpenSci to make R packages to connect open source data and literature into the R environment.

Check me out at Orcid orcid.org/0000-0003-1444-9135
